vars.FAQ_SUBTITLE: Find answers to common questions about our services

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How much does a custom fursuit cost?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: The price of a custom fursuit depends on the design complexity, type (full fursuit or partial), materials, and additional features. For an exact quote, contact us through our social media channels with references of your fursona.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How do I order a custom fursuit?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: To order a custom fursuit, contact The Hard Fun via social media. Send your fursona references, design ideas, and any specific requirements. We will discuss the details, pricing, and production timeline before starting the order.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Do you ship custom fursuits worldwide?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes, we ship custom fursuits worldwide. International shipping options, costs, and delivery times will be discussed during the ordering process.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How long does it take to make a custom fursuit?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Production time varies depending on order volume and complexity. Custom fursuits usually take several weeks to complete. Estimated timelines are provided before production begins.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Can I buy a custom fursuit online without experience?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. We guide you through the entire process, making it easy to buy a custom fursuit online even if it’s your first time.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: What types of custom fursuits do you offer?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: We offer full custom fursuits, partial fursuits, fursuit heads, paws, tails, and custom accessories.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Do you make fursuits based on my fursona?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. Every custom fursuit is designed based on your fursona references to ensure accuracy and individuality.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Are your custom fursuits comfortable to wear?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. Comfort, ventilation, and wearability are important parts of our design process.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Can I request changes during production?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Minor adjustments can be discussed depending on the production stage. All details are confirmed before work begins.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How do I contact The Hard Fun?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: You can contact us directly through our official social media accounts. This is the main way to start a custom fursuit order.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How can I buy a fursuit online?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: To buy a fursuit online from The Hard Fun, contact us through our social media accounts. Send your fursona references or let us know what type of fursuit you are interested in. We will guide you through the ordering process step by step.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Do you sell custom fursuits online?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. We specialize in selling custom fursuits online, including full fursuits, partial fursuits, fursuit heads, paws, tails, and custom accessories.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Is it safe to buy a fursuit online?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. We communicate directly with customers, provide clear order details, and confirm all design elements before production begins. Buying a fursuit online from The Hard Fun is transparent and secure.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How much does it cost to buy a fursuit online?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: The price depends on the type of fursuit, complexity of the design, and materials. To receive an accurate price, contact us via social media with your ideas and references.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Do you ship fursuits worldwide?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes, we offer worldwide shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times are discussed during the ordering process when you buy a fursuit online.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How long does it take to receive a fursuit after ordering?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Production time varies depending on order complexity and queue. After production is complete, shipping time depends on your location. Estimated timelines are provided before you confirm your order.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Can I buy a fursuit online if I don’t have a fursona?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. You can buy a fursuit online even if you don’t have a finished fursona. We can help you define the design during the ordering process.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Payment methods and terms are discussed individually when you contact us through social media to buy a fursuit online.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: Will I receive updates during production?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: Yes. We keep customers informed during key stages of production.

FAQ_ITEMS.question: How do I contact you to buy a fursuit online?
FAQ_ITEMS.answer: To buy a fursuit online, contact The Hard Fun through our official social media channels. This is the primary way to place an order.
